Package org.slf4j.cal10n

SLF4J API extensions

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocLogger
    A logger specialized in localized logging.
    LocLoggerFactory
    This class is essentially a wrapper around an LoggerFactory producing LocLogger instances.
